casebody.data:
First Department,

July, 1977

(July 5, 1977) Consolidated Edison Company of New York, Inc, Respondent, v Solex Associates Corp. et al. Appellants, et al. Defendants.

— Order, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on April 13, 1977, unanimously affirmed for the reasons stated by Sutton, J. Respondent shall recover of appellants $60 costs and disbursements of this appeal. Concur — Lupiano, J. P, Birns, Silverman and Capozzoli, JJ.
